description:
On Deleting Volume assertion fails saying "204 != 202"

According to the available  documentation on volumes
"http://docs.rackspace.com/openstack-extensions/compute/os-bs/content/index.html"
deleting the volume should return 204 as response code.

FAIL: Volume should be created, verified and deleted
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/unnimaya/MYTempest/VOLUMES/tempest/tempest/tests/test_volumes.py", line 136, in test_volume_create_delete
    self.assertEqual(204, resp.status)
AssertionError: 204 != 202

Error code Generated for deletion using Nova command


REQ: curl -i http://127.0.0.1:5000/v2.0/tokens -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -H "Accept: application/json" -H "User-Agent: python-novaclient"

REQ BODY: {"auth": {"tenantName": "demo", "passwordCredentials": {"username": "demo", "password": "muralik"}}}


RESP:{'date': 'Thu, 16 Feb 2012 20:56:33 GMT', 'vary': 'X-Auth-Token', 'content-length': '1444', 'status': '200', 'content-type': 'application/json; charset=UTF-8'} {"access": {"token": {"expires": "2012-02-18T00:18:26", "tenants": [{"id": "74da8012b13c4d9195f11c10605ec7d0", "name": "demo"}], "id": "8a65e999-4c36-4305-bbd6-e6b0a7c6342f", "tenant": {"id": "74da8012b13c4d9195f11c10605ec7d0", "name": "demo"}}, "serviceCatalog": [{"endpoints": [{"id": "1", "region": "RegionOne", "publicURL": "http://10.233.52.27:8774/v1.1/74da8012b13c4d9195f11c10605ec7d0", "internalURL": "http://10.233.52.27:8774/v1.1/74da8012b13c4d9195f11c10605ec7d0", "tenantId": "74da8012b13c4d9195f11c10605ec7d0"}], "type": "compute", "name": "nova"}, {"endpoints": [{"id": "2", "region": "RegionOne", "internalURL": "http://10.233.52.27:8773/services/Cloud", "publicURL": "http://10.233.52.27:8773/services/Cloud"}], "type": "ec2", "name": "ec2"}, {"endpoints": [{"id": "3", "region": "RegionOne", "internalURL": "http://10.233.52.27:9292/v1", "publicURL": "http://10.233.52.27:9292/v1"}], "type": "image", "name": "glance"}, {"endpoints": [{"id": "4", "region": "RegionOne", "internalURL": "http://10.233.52.27:5000/v2.0", "publicURL": "http://10.233.52.27:5000/v2.0"}], "type": "identity", "name": "keystone"}], "user": {"id": "8837101af2434cdfbd346e101906ba0a", "roles": [{"name": "Member", "id": "2", "tenantId": "74da8012b13c4d9195f11c10605ec7d0"}, {"name": "sysadmin", "id": "5", "tenantId": "74da8012b13c4d9195f11c10605ec7d0"}, {"name": "netadmin", "id": "6", "tenantId": "74da8012b13c4d9195f11c10605ec7d0"}], "name": "demo"}}}

REQ: curl -i http://10.233.52.27:8774/v1.1/74da8012b13c4d9195f11c10605ec7d0/os-volumes/4 -X GET -H "X-Auth-Project-Id: demo" -H "User-Agent: python-novaclient" -H "Accept: application/json" -H "X-Auth-Token: 8a65e999-4c36-4305-bbd6-e6b0a7c6342f"


RESP:{'status': '200', 'content-length': '245', 'content-location': u'http://10.233.52.27:8774/v1.1/74da8012b13c4d9195f11c10605ec7d0/os-volumes/4', 'x-compute-request-id': 'req-daf02c47-bfe9-4679-b0d3-96436d46dd29', 'date': 'Thu, 16 Feb 2012 20:56:33 GMT', 'content-type': 'application/json'} {"volume": {"status": "available", "displayDescription": null, "availabilityZone": "nova", "displayName": null, "attachments": [{}], "volumeType": null, "snapshotId": null, "size": 1, "id": 4, "createdAt": "2012-02-16 20:55:27", "metadata": {}}}

title: Deleting Volume returns wrong response code

comments.content:
On Deleting Volume assertion fails saying "204 != 202" 

According to the available  documentation on volumes 
"http://docs.rackspace.com/openstack-extensions/compute/os-bs/content/index.html"
deleting the volume should return 204 as response code.

FAIL: Volume should be created, verified and deleted
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/unnimaya/MYTempest/VOLUMES/tempest/tempest/tests/test_volumes.py", line 136, in test_volume_create_delete
    self.assertEqual(204, resp.status)
AssertionError: 204 != 202
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~rajalakshmi-ganesan

comments.content: You are referring to the documentation of a rackspace-specific extension (notice the domain is 'rackspace.com'), yet you are making your request agains the openstack extension. There is no 'openstack block storage' extension that ships with Nova. Additionally, 202 *is* the proper response code.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~bcwaldon
